verses.verse: טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> Better רָ֭שׁ <WH7326> [is] the poor הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> that walketh בְּתֻמּ֑וֹ <WH8537> in his integrity מֵעִקֵּ֥שׁ <WH6141> than [he that is] perverse שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> in his lips וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and is כְסִֽיל׃ <WH3684> and is a fool

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Also בְּלֹא־ <WH3808> to be without דַ֣עַת <WH1847> [be] without knowledge נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> Also [that] the soul לֹא־ <WH3808> to be without ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [it is] not good וְאָ֖ץ <WH213> and he that hasteth בְּרַגְלַ֣יִם <WH7272> with [his] feet חוֹטֵֽא׃ <WH2398> sinneth

אִוֶּ֣לֶת <WH200> The foolishness אָ֭דָם <WH120> of man תְּסַלֵּ֣ף <WH5557> perverteth דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וְעַל־ <WH5921> against יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> against the LORD יִזְעַ֥ף <WH2196> fretteth לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> and his heart
ה֗וֹן <WH1952> Wealth יֹ֭סִיף <WH3254> maketh רֵעִ֣ים <WH7453> friends רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְ֝דָ֗ל <WH1800> but the poor מֵרֵ֥עהוּ <WH7453> from his neighbour יִפָּרֵֽד׃ <WH6504> is separated

עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness שְׁ֭קָרִים <WH8267> A false לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִנָּקֶ֑ה <WH5352> shall not be unpunished וְיָפִ֥יחַ <WH6315> and [he that] speaketh כְּ֝זָבִ֗ים <WH3577> lies לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <WH4422> shall not escape

רַ֭בִּים <WH7227> Many יְחַלּ֣וּ <WH2470> will intreat פְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the favour נָדִ֑יב <WH5081> of the prince וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הָ֝רֵ֗עַ <WH7453> and every man [is] a friend לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to him מַתָּֽן׃ <WH4976> that giveth gifts

כָּ֥ל <WH3605> All אֲחֵי־ <WH251> All the brethren רָ֨שׁ ׀ <WH7326> of the poor שְֽׂנֵאֻ֗הוּ <WH8130> do hate אַ֤ף <WH637> How כִּ֣י <WH3588> do מְ֭רֵעֵהוּ <WH4828> him how much more do his friends רָחֲק֣וּ <WH7368> go far מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at מְרַדֵּ֖ף <WH7291> from him? he pursueth אֲמָרִ֣ים <WH561> [them with] words [לֹא־ כ] (לֹו־ <WH3808> not הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like ק)

קֹֽנֶה־ <WH7069> He that getteth לֵּ֭ב <WH3820> wisdom אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> loveth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own soul שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> he that keepeth תְּ֝בוּנָ֗ה <WH8394> understanding לִמְצֹא־ <WH4672> shall find טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good

עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness שְׁ֭קָרִים <WH8267> A false לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִנָּקֶ֑ה <WH5352> shall not be unpunished וְיָפִ֖יחַ <WH6315> and [he that] speaketh כְּזָבִ֣ים <WH3577> lies יֹאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> shall perish פ

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not נָאוֶ֣ה <WH5000> is not seemly לִכְסִ֣יל <WH3684> for a fool תַּעֲנ֑וּג <WH8588> Delight אַ֝֗ף <WH637> less כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעֶ֤בֶד ׀ <WH5650> much less for a servant מְשֹׁ֬ל <WH4910> to have rule בְּשָׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> over princes

שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> The discretion אָ֭דָם <WH120> of a man הֶאֱרִ֣יךְ <WH748> deferreth אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> his anger וְ֝תִפאַרְתּ֗וֹ <WH8597> and [it is] his glory עֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> to pass over עַל־ <WH5921> and פָּֽשַׁע׃ <WH6588> a transgression

נַ֣הַם <WH5099> [is] as the roaring כַּ֭כְּפִיר <WH3715> of a lion זַ֣עַף <WH2197> wrath מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> The king's וּכְטַ֖ל <WH2919> [is] as dew עַל־ <WH5921> on עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> upon the grass רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> but his favour

הַוֹּ֣ת <WH1942> [is] the calamity לְ֭אָבִיו <WH1> of his father בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son כְּסִ֑יל <WH3684> A foolish וְדֶ֥לֶף <WH1812> dropping טֹ֝רֵ֗ד <WH2956> [are] a continual מִדְיְנֵ֥י <WH4079> and the contentions אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> of a wife

בַּ֣יִת <WH1004> House וָ֭הוֹן <WH1952> and riches נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> [are] the inheritance אָב֑וֹת <WH1> of fathers וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [is] from the LORD אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> wife מַשְׂכָּֽלֶת׃ <WH7919> and a prudent
עַ֭צְלָה <WH6103> Slothfulness תַּפִּ֣יל <WH5307> casteth תַּרְדֵּמָ֑ה <WH8639> into a deep sleep וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul רְמִיָּ֣ה <WH7423> and an idle תִרְעָֽב׃ <WH7456> shall suffer hunger

שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> He that keepeth מִ֭צְוָה <WH4687> the commandment שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> keepeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own soul בּוֹזֵ֖ה <WH959> [but] he that despiseth דְרָכָ֣יו <WH1870> his ways [יוּמָת כ] (יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> crying ק)

מַלְוֵ֣ה <WH3867> lendeth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD ח֣וֹנֵֽן <WH2603> He that hath pity דָּ֑ל <WH1800> upon the poor וּ֝גְמֻל֗וֹ <WH1576> and that which he hath given יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> will he pay him again לֽוֹ׃

יַסֵּ֣ר <WH3256> Chasten בִּ֭נְךָ <WH1121> thy son כִּי־ <WH3588> while יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> while there is תִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> hope וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הֲ֝מִית֗וֹ <WH4191> for his crying אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> spare נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> and let not thy soul

[גֹּרַל־ כ] (גְּֽדָל־ <WH1632> of great חֵ֭מָה <WH1632> of great ק) נֹ֣שֵׂא <WH5375> shall suffer עֹ֑נֶשׁ <WH6066> punishment כִּ֥י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if תַּ֝צִּ֗יל <WH5337> for if thou deliver וְע֣וֹד <WH5750> again תּוֹסִֽף׃ <WH3254> [him] yet thou must do it again

שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear עֵ֭צָה <WH6098> counsel וְקַבֵּ֣ל <WH6901> and receive מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> instruction לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> that תֶּחְכַּ֥ם <WH2449> that thou mayest be wise בְּאַחֲרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH319> in thy latter end

רַבּ֣וֹת <WH7227> [There are] many מַחֲשָׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> devices בְּלֶב־ <WH3820> heart אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> in a man's וַעֲצַ֥ת <WH6098> nevertheless the counsel יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God הִ֣יא <WH1931> he תָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> that shall stand
תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> The desire אָדָ֣ם <WH120> of a man חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> [is] his kindness וְטֽוֹב־ <WH2896> [is] better רָ֝שׁ <WH7326> and a poor man מֵאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> than כָּזָֽב׃ <WH3577> a liar

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> [tendeth] to life וְשָׂבֵ֥עַ <WH7649> satisfied יָ֝לִ֗ין <WH3885> and [he that hath it] shall abide בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִפָּ֥קֶד <WH6485> he shall not be visited רָֽע׃ <WH7451> with evil

טָ֘מַ֤ן <WH2934> [man] hideth עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> A slothful יָ֭דוֹ <WH3027> his hand בַּצַּלָּ֑חַת <WH6747> in [his] bosom גַּם־ <WH1571> even אֶל־ <WH413> to his פִּ֝֗יהוּ <WH6310> it to his mouth לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7725> again

לֵ֣ץ <WH3887> a scorner תַּ֭כֶּה <WH5221> Smite וּפֶ֣תִי <WH6612> and the simple יַעְרִ֑ם <WH6191> will beware וְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> and reprove לְ֝נָב֗וֹן <WH995> one that hath understanding יָבִ֥ין <WH995> [and] he will understand דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge

מְֽשַׁדֶּד־ <WH7703> He that wasteth אָ֭ב <WH1> [his] father יַבְרִ֣יחַ <WH1272> [and] chaseth away אֵ֑ם <WH517> [his] mother בֵּ֝֗ן <WH1121> [is] a son מֵבִ֥ישׁ <WH954> that causeth shame וּמַחְפִּֽיר׃ <WH2659> and bringeth reproach

חַֽדַל־ <WH2308> Cease בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> my son לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> to hear מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> the instruction לִ֝שְׁג֗וֹת <WH7686> [that causeth] to err מֵֽאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> from the words דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> of knowledge

עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <WH1100> An ungodly יָלִ֣יץ <WH3887> scorneth מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment וּפִ֥י <WH6310> and the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked יְבַלַּע־ <WH1104> devoureth אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> iniquity
נָכ֣וֹנוּ <WH3559> are prepared לַלֵּצִ֣ים <WH3887> for scorners שְׁפָטִ֑ים <WH8201> Judgments וּ֝מַהֲלֻמ֗וֹת <WH4112> and stripes לְגֵ֣ו <WH1460> for the back כְּסִילִֽים׃ <WH3684> of fools
